question: I had a dream but i am not sure what it means so i would be very grateful if you could clarify the interpretation for me
answer:
QUESTION
In my dream i was in my kitchen and there was a multi-coloured bird flying in front of me I wanted to get to the door to let it out but it would keep on stopping me with its wings. someone then opened the door and he bird flew away. Someone then came up to me and said that they saw the prophet PBUH and some women. I then recall myself sitting in my garden and seeing the mosque down the road from me it was being repaired and saying to my siblings how beautiul it looked.
